body.section:
These are some example apps you can download to learn how to work with Turbine.
Antelope is an example app that demonstrates how to use the Zebra workflow engine with Turbine. It also demonstrates Hibernate integration, Fulcrum Security, and a form processing engine similar to Intake.
This example app shows how to integrate the OSWorkflow engine into Turbine. You can click through the various screens following the progress of your workflow.
